page.title: 05Court Farm continued.
page.content: {Problems and future deveolpments: Each farmer is set a monthly quota of milk to be produced by the Milk Marketing Board.If Fred Knight exceeds his quota,he has to pay a levy to the Milk Marketing Board. Fred Knight feels that there is no stability in farming in the 1980s and does not know what the future holds.It is he feels very difficult to adjust to the needs of society.With the development of more efficient methods of farming and increasingly high yields from the land,Fred feels that changes in the use of farm land are inevitable.It is thus anticipated that more farmland in the future will be used for leisure activities;camping,shooting,nature trails and education.To quote Fred,"What else do you do with the land if you can't produce food ?"
